item.title: Intro to Model Context Protocol
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Just a few days ago, Anthropic introduced the Model Context Protocol (MCP), and it’s a pretty exciting development for AI! MCP is designed to make AI assistants way smarter and more useful by helping them connect seamlessly with tools, data, and apps we use every day.
